comments: 1 degree = Pi/180 radians (=0.0174532925199432957692369076848...). For the reciprocal conversion factor, see A072097.
references: Murray R. Spiegel, Seymour Lipschutz, John Liu. Mathematical Handbook of Formulas and Tables, 3rd Ed. Schaum's Outline Series. New York: McGraw-Hill (2009): 4
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Typo in the name (Pi/180 instead of Pi/18) corrected by _Stanislav Sykora_, Mar 14 2012
